SEARCH
Package org.application.sessions

Class SessionsService

java.lang.Object
org.application.sessions.SessionsService
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISessionsService
public class SessionsService extends Object implements ISessionsService
Represents a service class for managing Session entities. This class defines the service operations that can be performed, specific to session service.

  • Method Details

    • addSession

      public Session addSession(Session.Type type, String halfYear, String disciplineName) throws SessionAdditionException, DisciplineNotFoundException, ValidationException
      Adds a new Session with the given type, half year and discipline name.
      Specified by:
      addSession in interface ISessionsService
      Parameters:
      type - The type of the new Session.
      halfYear - The half year of the new Session.
      disciplineName - The discipline name of the new Session.
      Returns:
      The newly created Session.
      Throws:
      SessionAdditionException - If the Session could not be added.
      DisciplineNotFoundException - If the discipline could not be found.
      ValidationException - If the provided type, half year or discipline name are invalid.

    • deleteSession

      public boolean deleteSession(int sessionId) throws SessionNotFoundException, SessionDeletionFailed, ValidationException
      Deletes the Session with the given id.
      Specified by:
      deleteSession in interface ISessionsService
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The id of the Session to delete.
      Returns:
      True if the Session was deleted, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SessionNotFoundException - If the Session could not be found.
      SessionDeletionFailed - If the Session could not be deleted.
      ValidationException - If the provided id is invalid.
